# Connecting to *anime game 2* PS with CrepePlus (mitmproxy)
### Credits: Midrooms on GitHub, Crepe-Inc (CrÃªperie)
<Callout type="info" emoji="ðŸ¤¡">
  **README**\
  CrepePlus = for lazy people
</Callout>

## Required to play
* [Latest version of Python](https://www.python.org/downloads/)
* [Node.js v14](https://nodejs.org/dist/v18.12.1/node-v18.12.1.pkg)
* [mitmproxy](https://snapshots.mitmproxy.org/9.0.1/mitmproxy-9.0.1-windows-x64-installer.exe)
* [CrepePlus (bat)](https://github.com/Midrooms/CrepePlus/releases) or [CrepePlus (app)](https://github.com/Midrooms/CrepePlus/releases/download/v1.4/CrepePlus-1.2.2.Setup.exe)
* [*anime game 2*](https://sbchitang-my.sharepoint.com/personal/public_chitang_dev/_layouts/15/download.aspx?UniqueId=e0a3d87e-5e87-4d5f-9886-ac158d327bae&Translate=false&tempauth=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..L3hWclBVbEVRU2lnWGlYeUhlSUkyeFJhTkRPYVVIOUlwSFJJNm1jR2hLST0&ApiVersion=2.0)
* [MongoDB Compass](https://www.mongodb.com/try/download/compass) and [MongoDB Community](https://www.mongodb.com/try/download/community)
* [Visual Studio (C++ workload)](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/thank-you-downloading-visual-studio/?sku=Community&channel=Release&version=VS2022&source=VSLandingPage&cid=2030&passive=false)
## Connecting (CrepePlus bat)

1. Once you are done downloading everything, run "CrepePlusManager.bat". Select the "Install NPM modules" option. (Select this option by typing "3" in the console. Also, you only need to do this once.)
2. After installing, select the "Start the CrepePlus server" option in the console. (Type in "1")
3. Open "StarRail.exe" once CrepePlus has started.

## Connecting (CrepePlus app)
1. Download everything from above. (ofc except bat CrepePlus)
2. Click on "Tutorial" in the menu. The tutorial on how to use the app will be written here.

To make an account, use
```sh
/account add (account name) (account uid)
example: 
/account create rrryfoo 1000
```
